#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define MAX 1002
int main()
{
  int i,j,t,count[256]={0};
  char ch[MAX];
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
      memset(count,0,sizeof(count));
      scanf("%s",ch);
      j=strlen(ch);
      for(i=0;i<j;i++)
      {
          count[ch[i]]++;
      }
      for(i=97;i<123;i++)
      {
          if(count[i]%2==1)
          {
              while(count[i]>0)
              {
                  printf("%c",i);
                  count[i]--;
              }
          }
      }
      for(i=97;i<123;i++)
      {
          if(count[i]%2==0 && count[i])
          {
              while(count[i]>0)
              {
                  printf("%c",i);
                  count[i]--;
              }
          }
      }
      printf("\n");
  }
 
return 0;
}
